sentence: US stock futures were pointing to a higher open as investors awaited earnings from Apple ( AAPL ) after the market close and heavyweights Procter & Gamble ( PG ), Pfizer ( PFE ) and Archer Daniels Midland ( ADM ) posted quarterly earnings beats.
A heavy batch of data are also due.
In addition to personal income, core PCE prices and the employment cost index that were out at 8.30 a.m.
ET, Chicago purchasing managers' index is at 9:45 a.m.
ET and the Dallas Fed's Texas service sector outlook survey at 10:30 a.m.
FOMC also starts its 2-day meeting on Tuesday.
